about_the_game:
Chapter 2: Bus Explosion Incident

Summary:

An explosion suddenly occurred on a bus heading to the suburbs, leaving the scene in complete disarray. All 10 passengers, including the sales clerk, on board were killed.

Lin Shanhai led the on-site investigation team to thoroughly examine the scene and interview all the deceased's family members and friends, but the case remains a complete mystery.

He decides to recreate the real situation inside the bus prior to the incident and use deductive reasoning to analyze it.

Everything comes down to the crucial 10 minutes.

You will enter this tense 10-minute loop
and use deductive reasoning to crack the
mystery of this explosion case. Analyze
every detail - uncovering the truth will
bring the culprit to justice!

Gameplay:

Players must first search the crime scene for clues, then piece together the evidence in the mind map to uncover the truth. You can use the clue radar to locate physical evidence, and the clue analyzer to assist with deduction when uncertain about a clue.
